   Stop Gillnetting Now
   stated on May 30, 2012 in campaign press statement:
   Says "Oregon is one of only three states that allow the use of gillnets on
   inland waters."

"Currently, Oregon is one of only three states that allow the use of
   gillnets on inland waters" reads a May 30 press release by the Stop
   Gillnetting Now campaign.

"Oregon," the revised statement reads, "is one of
   only a few states left that allows the use of commercial gillnets on
   rivers and streams."
